title: #170: Teacher's Pet - Helena's Diary Entries
description:
Laura and Jim analyse and discuss with Lisa Helena's diary entries. They include her observations of what was going on behind closed doors and the impact Chris Dawson's behaviour was having on Lyn.


#HerNameWasLynDawson

#CoerciveControl

#TheTeachersPet


If you have any information about Lyn's disappearance and/or the historical sexual abuse allegations, please contact Crimestoppers on 1800 333 000



For more information about coercive control

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/deep-diving-coercive-control/
